oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Possibilities for closing the urban rural nutrient cycles
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Refsgaard, Karen
Jenssen, Petter D.
Magid, Jakob
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This Chapter discuss the potential of organic farming for contributing to sustainable development, mainly in lw-income countries, by integrating urban settlements with rual communities, through the recycling of domestic and household waste.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Refsgaard, Karen; Jenssen, Petter D. and Magid, Jakob (2006) Possibilities for closing the urban rural nutrient cycles. In: Halberg, N.; Knudsen, M.T. and Kristensen, E.S. (Eds.) Global Development of Organic Agriculture: Challenges and Prospects. CaB International, chapter 7, pp. 181-214.
